dct_description_sm: Reactions Publishing Group Aon Political Risk Euromoney Publication PLC Alternate title: Aon global political risk map. Shows international time zones. Scale given on map is erroneous, 1:500,000. The right scale is approx. 1:36,500,000. Verso: Title panel and list of countries in Aon worldwide network.
dct_publisher_sm: London : Reactions Pub. Group : Aon Ltd., ©2003.
